body:
Comment 3: 
I am claiming (not forcefully, mind) that there is no reason to
require putting down "_ =" in a range loop. It's not irregular to
allow this; it feels more regular to me.

And yes, it would work for all types. Again, not irregular.

There are a lot more than my 2 cases. There are 28 instances in the
sources and tests for the standard library.
